top_comments.comment: This game was Staycation’s first win on this map. Funny to see it from a different perspective and to see two of my favorite creators in the same game!
Lets Gooooo !!!!   600k   !!!!!! Congrats and All the Best for ur Future !!!! Love ur Vids 🤩
You should have used bloodhound to hear the jnteractions

comments_since_last_sample.body: Well all the super sweaty people are gonna play ash and make the third party even worse with her abilities. I fear this character may kill the game for me

I wonder what they will do about the death boxes that the flyers drop on kings canyon when they eventually bring it back.  That's probably a good reason as to why it's vaulted too. They're probably going to have to rework it so that the flyers start after round 1 and they grab death boxes from the map and carry them around, or the first few can drop the death boxes of the team the champion killed.. like when they introduce the champion, somewhere on kc there is 2-3 flyers with the same loot the 2nd place team had at the end of the champion's last match, and the deathbox can lead you to the champion if you're Ash.  The flyers will spawn wherever is the least populated part of the map once everyone's feet are on the ground off drop.
I was the bamboozle king
